description:
It seems IptablesFirewallDriver has not code for  FLAGS.allow_project_net_traffic is not implemented in IptablesFirewallDriver.

When I run nova on multiple node, I can not  ping or ssh to instances.
Then, I checked iptables rule, I could not found no rule that's allow packet from same project.
title: FLAGS.allow_project_net_traffic is not implemented in IptablesFirewallDriver
